meanings.definition: A burrowing rodent of the family Geomyidae, native to North and Central America.
meanings.sent1: The gophers dug tunnels underground to make their homes.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of gophers scurrying across the field.
meanings.sent3: The gophers had a neighborhood party in their tunnel.
meanings.sent4: The gophers' network of tunnels resembled a complex maze.
meanings.sent5: The gophers' digging habits can cause issues for farmers.

meanings.definition: A native or inhabitant of Minnesota.
meanings.sent1: Many gophers enjoy the cold winters in Minnesota.
meanings.sent2: The gophers in Minnesota are used to the snowy weather.
meanings.sent3: The gophers in Minnesota love ice fishing on the weekends.
meanings.sent4: Being a gopher in Minnesota means embracing all four seasons.
meanings.sent5: The gophers in Minnesota are proud of their state.

meanings.definition: A type of software used for retrieving documents on the internet.
meanings.sent1: I used gophers to search for information online.
meanings.sent2: The gophers software made it easy to find what I needed.
meanings.sent3: The gophers program helped me navigate the vast internet.
meanings.sent4: With gophers, finding specific data became effortless.
meanings.sent5: Gophers revolutionized the way we access online resources.
